name: meteoroids!
description:
meteoroids! is an action-packed video game first released in 1978 by 57knuckleknock. In the game, players control a small spaceship, defending itself against waves of incoming meteoroids. The objective is to shoot and destroy those meteoroids, while also aiming for the highest score!

meteoroids! features an advanced difficulty system,  as players progress through the game, the meteoroids come much quicker, testing the player's reflex and hand-eye coordination skills, this all makes for simple, yet addictive gameplay!

Not only that, meteoroids! also prides itself to be one of the games that features state-of-the-art graphics, immerse yourself in the finest-quality vector graphics and the best sound effects the 80s has to offer!

EXPERIENCE THE SPACE AGE TO THE FULLEST!
